homeMain.about_text_1: It looks like this days finding good dynamic dummy data is not an easy task...
homeMain.about_text_2: For that reason I created my own
homeMain.about_text_4: In here the user will find a lot of dummy data which he could change to fit his own needs!
homeMain.posts_text_3: contains the most interesting and complex data
homeMain.posts_text_6: Here the user can find Posts and Comments that relate to a specific user from the users collection. Meaning that handling this collection will ask the user to select a specific person from the Users list before making any changes.
homeMain.posts_text_8: Post only by the currect User
homeMain.movies_text_3: contains the majority of the raw unmanipulated data in this placeholder.
homeMain.movies_text_4: In here the user will find data for over 250 TV seris - Title, Network, Rating and more... This API will also allow the user to work with a Pagination format, Selecting the amount of data to recieve on each AJAX.
homeMain.users_text_1: The first json collection is the
homeMain.users_text_3: . In here the user can find and manipulate a list of users and there details.

createUserMain.avatarText: After creating a new user, you could find and edit him in the Users JSON section. Another feature is the create or comment a post by this new user.
